title: Journey to the Mountain
atmosphere: Open frontier. The terrain transitions from cultivated farmland to rugged wilderness. Mount Salbarii looms larger with each passing hour, a constant reminder of the challenge ahead.
description: The Travellers travel overland from the starport to Mount Salbarii. They can hire local transport, use an ATV, or attempt the journey on foot. Along the way they encounter the challenges of Walston's thin atmosphere and varied terrain.
objectives: Reach the base of Mount Salbarii

triggers.entry: Travellers depart from Walston settlement with transport arranged
triggers.exit: Travellers reach the base of Mount Salbarii at 500m altitude

atv_rental.notes: Requires Drive skill for difficult terrain

hired_guide.benefit: Local knowledge of terrain and hazards
hired_guide.notes: Guide knows best routes, Tensher territories

on_foot.risk: Higher fatigue, more exposure to hazards
on_foot.notes: Filter masks essential for thin atmosphere

hazards.name: Thin Atmosphere
hazards.description: Walston's thin atmosphere requires filter masks outside settlements

hazards.name: Rough Country
hazards.description: Rocky outcrops, dry riverbeds, and unstable slopes
hazards.consequence: Vehicle damage possible, slower progress on foot

hazards.name: Tensher Wolves
hazards.description: Territorial pack hunters native to Walston
hazards.consequence: May need to detour or defend against attack

narrator_prompt: This journey builds anticipation. The mountain grows larger, the terrain rougher, the atmosphere thinner. The Travellers are leaving civilization behind. Make them feel the distance, but don't bog down in tedium - highlight key moments and challenges.
